column5: just wondering if anyone has any info to share on white lake in the nipigon region? my daughter maybe be working in the area for the summer and if so i plan on going up for 5 days in july to visit her and will plan on doing some fishing and camping at the park. So any info anyone can share would be greatly appreciated
If you go to White Lake Provincial Park, great walleye fishing.
I stopped there briefly on my cross canada trip and it looked like a nice peaceful park.Â  I heard the fishing there is pretty good for walleye.
